Contributor: Seargeant Bros., printer.; Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee, publisher.;
Description: The beginning of Admiral Nelson's address at the battle of Trafalgar, 1805, reminds potential recruits of their duty.  Admiral Nelson is pictured at right of a picture of a battle at sea (Trafalgar?).
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Series: Poster (Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee) ; no. 101.
